title: Monster Mania #03 [1967-04] (Darwination-McCoy)
description: Monster Mania was a short-lived 1960s movie monster/horror magazine with nice production values which was published by Renaissance Productions and edited by Russ Jones of Creepy fame. It unfortunately lasted only three issues. Monster Mania #03 [1967-04]. (Cover photo of Peter Cushing as Baron Frankenstein from "Frankenstein Created Woman") Articles include: "Mania Film Review And Preview" ("Frankenstein Created Woman"; "The Brides Of Fu Manchu"; "Chamber Of Horrors"; "A Study In Terror"); "The Wolf Man" by Richard Bojarski; "The Revenge Of Frankenstein" by Chris Fellner (short story based on the film).
